listitem.para: Implement a squarebrackets operator for this

detaileddescription.para: HumanFactors::NativeUtils::NativeArray Member HumanFactors.NativeUtils.NativeArray< T >.ToString () Optional toggle for truncation, and modifiable truncation threshold.
HumanFactors::Geometry::MeshInfo Class HumanFactors.Geometry.MeshInfo Support getting the name of a mesh from the OBJ.

HumanFactors::Geometry::MeshInfo Member HumanFactors.Geometry.MeshInfo.CalculatePresure () Make a function in C++ to calculate the size of indices/vertices so the amount of pressure to exert on the GC can properly be calculated.

HumanFactors::RayTracing::EmbreeBVH Member HumanFactors.RayTracing.EmbreeBVH.EmbreeBVH (MeshInfo MI) Add missing dependency exception
HumanFactors::RayTracing::RayResult Class HumanFactors.RayTracing.RayResult Function .checkhit that returns false if in_distance or in_mesh_id are true

HumanFactors::SpatialStructures::Graph Class HumanFactors.SpatialStructures.Graph Functions to access edges in the graph like numpy. Users shouldn't have to use unsafe functions to get the edges of a node from the CSR.
